casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Clark v. Echo, Inc., Appellant.
Argued January 28, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
William J. Moran, III, with him Hillegass <& Moran, for appellant.
Peter A. Glaseott, Assistant County Solicitor, with him Samuel S. Gray, County Solicitor, for county, appellee.
Garl L. Mease, Assistant Attorney General, for Commonwealth, Department of Health and Welfare, appellee.
April 22, 1970:
